MapConditionDef.label: solar flare
MapConditionDef.description: A solar flare is hitting the planet. This creates extreme electrical interference and prevents most electrical devices from working.

MapConditionDef.label: eclipse
MapConditionDef.description: An eclipse is shadowing the surface. It will be dark, even during the daytime.

MapConditionDef.label: psychic drone
MapConditionDef.description: A distant, powerful AI is emitting waves of psychic force that are driving people towards insanity.

MapConditionDef.label: psychic soothe
MapConditionDef.description: A distant, powerful AI is emitting waves of psychic force that are calming people and stabilizing their minds.

MapConditionDef.label: toxic fallout
MapConditionDef.description: A plume of toxic dust from some distant source is slowly settling over this entire region of the planet. Anyone not under a roof will be slowly poisoned.
MapConditionDef.endMessage: The worst of the toxic fallout has settled.

MapConditionDef.label: volcanic winter
MapConditionDef.description: The atmosphere is choked with volcanic particles, significantly reducing the amount of light which reaches the surface. Temperatures will be colder and plants will grow slower.
MapConditionDef.endMessage: Most of the volcanic ash has settled.

MapConditionDef.label: heat wave
MapConditionDef.description: An extreme wave of heat is baking the area.

MapConditionDef.label: cold snap
MapConditionDef.description: An unusual cold snap is freezing the region.

MapConditionDef.label: flashstorm
MapConditionDef.description: Extreme amounts of lightning are hitting a small region.

MapConditionDef.label: climate cycle
MapConditionDef.description: A multi-year climate cycle due to an elliptical orbit.

MapConditionDef.label: planetkiller
MapConditionDef.description: An interstellar planetkiller weapon is approaching this planet. When it hits, it will destroy all life.
